alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 12:08PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Elko and central Eureka Counties through 1245 PM PDT... At 1208 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pine Valley. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Elko and central Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
